name: @nutin/cli
description: A lightweight, highly tweakable frontend toolkit, crafted for building lean, dynamic single-page applications without the complexity of full-scale frameworks.

scripts.patch: npm version patch -m 'CI/CD: Bump version to %s'
scripts.minor: npm version minor -m 'CI/CD: Bump version to %s'
scripts.major: npm version major -m 'CI/CD: Bump version to %s'
